data.name: APPLICATION_NAME
data.value: Acumatica Shipping Tool Integration

data.name: ERROR_ADAPTER_SHIPMENT_SCREEN_IS_NOT_INTERACTIVE
data.value: The screen \"Shipment details \" is not available. Make sure that the application is running and not blocked by pop-up windows or message dialogs.

data.name: ERROR_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_DIRECTORY_ACCESS
data.value: Applicatoin settings error: Can`t get access to application settings configuration directory.

data.value: Applicatoin settings error: Can`t get access to application settings file

data.value: Applicatoin settings error: Can`t update application settings!

data.name: INFO_SUCCESS_UPDATE_SHIPMENT

data.name: MESSAGE_APPLICATION_EXIT
data.value: Do you want to exit?

data.name: MESSAGE_PARAMETERS_NEED_BE_INSTALLED
data.value: Before you start, you need to set the necessary settings for running the application. Required parameters are marked with *. Fill in the setting values and click OK to continue.

data.name: MESSAGE_PARAMETERS_NOT_INSTALLED
data.value: The parameters required for running the application are not installed. Continuation of work is impossible.

data.name: WARN_CURRENT_SHIPMENT_SCREEN_ISNOT_EMPTY
data.value: Current Shipment screen is not empty. Before load data from Acumatica and create new Shipment, you should process current shipment or Undo changes/Clear fields.

data.name: WARN_NOT_ALL_FIELDS_FILLED
data.value: One or more required fields can not be filled: [{0}]. Check the availability of fields and shipment data and try again.

data.name: WARN_NO_PROCESS_FOUND_FOR_UPS_APPLICATION
data.value: Cannot process the Shipment <{0}>. UPS WorldShip should be running.

data.name: WARN_NO_PROCESS_FOUND_FOR_FEDEX_APPLICATION
data.value: Cannot process the Shipment <{0}>. FedEx Ship Manager should be running.

data.value: Can not connect to Acumatica. Check the site is available, application Acumatica credentials settings, check local machine network available and try again.

data.name: WARN_NO_WAY_TO_GET_SHIPMENT_EXTENDED
data.value: Cannot locate the Acumatica Shipment. Please make sure that the Acumatica Shipment screen is active in one of the supported Web Browsers and a Shipment number is selected. [ {0} ]

data.name: _WARN_INCORRECT_DATA_AND_DIALOGS
data.value: Warnings or errors were received during data entry. This can be caused by incorrect data or the inability to insert data in automatic mode. Check inserted entries before proceeding.

data.name: WARN_SHIPMENT_IS_CONFIRMED_AND_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
data.value: Shipment <{0}> cannot be updated due to its Status. Please correct the shipment manually.

data.name: WARN_PARAMETERS_ARE_NOT_SAVED
data.value: Required setting value(s) cannot be empty. Changes rejected. Fill in the all required setting values and click <Save> to continue.
